Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan are placed in a relatively tough group with co-hosts West Indies, New Zealand, Uganda and Papua New Guinea.
Afghanistan are led by Rashid Khan at the ICC T20 World Cup 2024.
The tracks in the Caribbean are expected to be slow, which could benefit Afghanistan's strong spin bowling department.
Afghanistan's strength will be their spin department consisting of Mujeeb Ur Rahman, Noor Ahmad, Nangyal Kharoti and veteran Mohammad Nabi alongside the skipper Rashid Khan.
Naveen-ul-Haq, Fareed Ahmad and Fazalhaq Farooqi will act as support for their strong spin bowling.
A lot will depend on Rahmanullah Gurbaz if the batting has to stand strong.
Others: Afghanistan v Uganda, Guyana, 08:30 PM LOCAL (June 4, 6 AM IST)
